title: Indigenous Knowledge-Based Microlearning for Sustainability Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Environment and Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
context.additional_context: A course for in-service professionals featuring 15-minute modular learning via mobile devices and project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three traditional environmental management techniques passed down in indigenous societies and apply them to modern sustainability challenges
Learners can adapt five learning design principles (worldview definition, utilization of indigenous knowledge, etc.) for sustainability competency enhancement to practical case scenarios
Learners can use digital collaboration tools to develop community-based sustainability action plans and submit them as project deliverables
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
